components.name: Input Assembler
components.description: Collects and validates brand data, domain information, and audit parameters

components.name: Context Pack
components.description: Aggregates contextual data from multiple sources including web crawl, social signals, and historical data

components.name: AI Visibility Module
components.description: Queries major LLMs to measure brand appearance frequency and context

components.name: Brand Voice Module
components.description: Analyzes consistency of brand messaging across AI platforms

components.name: E-E-A-T Module
components.description: Evaluates expertise, experience, authoritativeness, and trustworthiness signals

components.name: Keyword Coverage Module
components.description: Measures visibility for non-branded industry terms across AI platforms

components.name: Content Depth Module
components.description: Assesses comprehensiveness and quality of brand content

components.name: Citations Module
components.description: Tracks brand citations and references from authoritative sources

components.name: Competitive Position Module
components.description: Analyzes brand position relative to competitors in AI responses

components.name: Output Aggregator
components.description: Consolidates insights, generates recommendations, and produces dashboard visualizations

stages.name: Data Collection
stages.description: Gather brand information and establish audit parameters

stages.name: Context Building
stages.description: Aggregate contextual data from multiple sources

stages.name: Module Execution
stages.description: Run parallel audit modules across 7 dimensions

stages.name: Results Synthesis
stages.description: Consolidate findings and generate actionable insights
